metadata.name: ESXi Syslog Configuration Change Via ESXCLI
metadata.comment: Detects changes to the ESXi syslog configuration via "esxcli"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/esxcli')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('syslog')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('config')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' set')))

output.summary: Detects changes to the ESXi syslog configuration via "esxcli"

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative activities References: https://support.solarwinds.com/SuccessCenter/s/article/Configure-ESXi-Syslog-to-LEM?language=en_US, https://developer.broadcom.com/xapis/esxcli-command-reference/7.0.0/namespace/esxcli_system.html
